org.apache.giraph.utils

类 ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.OutputStream
      • java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream
        • org.apache.giraph.utils.ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, DataOutput, Flushable, AutoCloseable, ExtendedDataOutput

    public class ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput
extends ByteArrayOutputStream
implements ExtendedDataOutput
    Adds some functionality to ByteArrayOutputStream, such as an option to write int value over previously written data and directly get the byte array.

    • 字段概要

      • 从类继承的字段 java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream

        buf, count

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput()
      Creates a new byte array output stream.
      ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput(byte[] buf)
      Uses the byte array provided or if null, use a default size
      ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput(byte[] buf, int pos)
      Uses the byte array provided at the given pos
      ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput(int size)
      Creates a new byte array output stream, with a buffer capacity of the specified size, in bytes.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      byte[] getByteArray()
      Get the internal byte array (if possible), read-only
      int getPos()
      Get the position in the output stream

      Skip some number of bytes.

      In order to write a size as a first part of an data output, it is useful to be able to write an int at an arbitrary location in the stream
      void writeLong(long v) 
      void writeShort(int v) 
      void writeUTF(String s)

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput

        public ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput(byte[] buf)
        Uses the byte array provided or if null, use a default size
        参数:
        buf - Buffer to use

      • ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput

        public ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput(byte[] buf,
                           int pos)
        Uses the byte array provided at the given pos
        参数:
        buf - Buffer to use
        pos - Position in the buffer to start writing from

      • ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput

        public ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput()
        Creates a new byte array output stream. The buffer capacity is initially 32 bytes, though its size increases if necessary.

      • ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput

        public ExtendedByteArrayDataOutput(int size)
        Creates a new byte array output stream, with a buffer capacity of the specified size, in bytes.
        参数:
        size - the initial size.
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if size is negative.

      • writeInt

        public void writeInt(int position,
            int value)
        从接口复制的说明: ExtendedDataOutput
        In order to write a size as a first part of an data output, it is useful to be able to write an int at an arbitrary location in the stream
        指定者:
        writeInt 在接口中 ExtendedDataOutput
        参数:
        position - Byte position in the output stream
        value - Value to write
